name: Uml2Ruby
body:
# UML2Ruby Eclipse Plugin
The UML2Ruby Eclipse Plugin translates UML diagrams to Ruby skeleton code.  It works with UML models created in [Papyrus](https://www.eclipse.org/papyrus/) and other Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) compatible editors.

## Features
Diagrams Supported:
* Class Diagrams
* Activity Diagrams

Shows up as an additional context menu for *.uml files in Eclipse
PICTURE HERE

## Installation
###Eclipse Marketplace
The plugin can be installed from the [Eclipse Marketplace](http://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/uml2ruby)

###Eclipse Update Site
The plugin can also be installed in Eclipse by clicking _Help->Install New Software_ and entering http://lizzard.freeshell.net/UML2Ruby/ as the update site.

###Source Code
The source code can be found on [Github](https://github.com/uiuc-cs428/uml2ruby) and is licensed under the [Modified BSD license](http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause).

## User Manual
Feature information including diagram and generated code examples can be found on our [wiki](https://github.com/uiuc-cs428/uml2ruby/wiki)
